## Section 2: Derivatives in R

```{r}
# Loading packages ----
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

# Derivatives using R ----

```{r}
# Function f(x) = x^2 at x = 3 ----
dfDx <- D(expression(x^2), "x")

# Setting x = 3 ----
x <- 3

# Evaluate dfDx at x = 3 ----
eval(dfDx)
```


```{r}
# Function P(a) = 2(3a + 2)^4 - 5 a = 1.2 ----
dpDa <- D(expression(2 * (3 * a + 2)^4 - 5), "a")

# Setting a = 1.2 ----
a <- 1.2

# Evaluating dpDa at a = 1.2 ----
eval(dpDa)
```
